title: Muramana selling for 0 gold
body:
I had a match the day before yesterday in which I tried to play a poke-esque Panth and therefore built Manamune.
 After some time it naturally upgraded into Muramana and as the game went on, we were in need of a tank.
I tried to rebuild for tank and as I was selling some items, I saw the "Sells for: 0g" and therefore didnt sell it, because I wouldnt be able to get anything out of it.
